title: Direct support for TypeScript and Angular 2 in Windows 10 HTML Apps
body:
It'd be awesome to create a new Windows App and select "HTML" > "TypeScript + Angular 2".
By TypeScript support I mean: No need to transpile it to JavaScript. Debugging TypeScript code directly. Typing information for all the APIs, so it feels similar to C#.
I know, Angular 2 isn't ready just yet but I hope this is something we can look forward to.
